props.name: dir
props.description:
The reading direction of the combobox when applicable.

If omitted, inherits globally from `ConfigProvider` or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: modal
props.description:
The modality of the dropdown menu.

When set to `true`, interaction with outside elements will be disabled and only menu content will be visible to screen readers.

props.name: pressOpenDelay
props.description: The duration from when the trigger is pressed until the menu opens.

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the combobox changes.
